content.text:
In a Residence B District the following regulations
shall apply.

No building may be erected, altered or used
and no lot or premises may be used except for one or more of the purposes
set forth in § 176-6 of Article III of this chapter.

No building shall be constructed on a lot of
an area less than 5,000 square feet, unless authorized by the Board
of Appeals pursuant to Article XIII, § 176-147A.

The building area shall not exceed 35% of the
lot area.

There shall be a front yard the depth of which
shall not be less than 20 feet.

There shall be a rear yard the depth of which
shall not be less than 25 feet.

paras.title: Side and rear yard requirements for single-family dwellings.

content.text:
In case of a single-family dwelling there shall
be side yards of at least 12 feet. Neither side yard shall be less
than five feet; provided, however, that in case of a lot held in single
and separate ownership at the effective date of this chapter and of
a width less than 50 feet or a depth less than 100 feet, six inches
may be deducted from the aggregate width of the side yards for each
foot in width such lot shall lack of the said 50 feet, but no side
yard shall be less than four feet wide; six inches may be deducted
from the required depth of the rear yard for each foot in depth such
lot shall lack of the said 100 feet, but the depth of such rear yard
shall in no case be reduced thereby to less than 15 feet.

No building shall exceed 2 1/2 stories or 31
feet in height.

All buildings, other than buildings being used
as detached one-family or detached two-family dwellings, shall have
side yards of at least 15 feet. Notwithstanding the foregoing, any
existing nonconforming building in excess of 31 feet in height shall
have side yards of at least 20 feet.

In case of a corner lot, a building shall be
required to comply with the front yard restrictions only on the narrower
street front. The depth of yard from the other street lines shall
be 20% of the width of the lot, but need not be more than 20 feet.

paras.title: Street frontage and front yard width.

content.text:
The minimum street frontage and front yard width
shall be 50 feet.

For the purpose of preserving the comprehensive zoning
plan set forth in this chapter and the character of the residential
neighborhood which has developed in accordance with that plan and
for the purpose of protecting the lives and property of residents
living in that area of the Village's Residence B District and Residence
A-1 District where there are extreme changes in the elevation of the
terrain, the additional restrictions are imposed on certain lands
in the Residence B District and Residence A-1 District.

Not more than one detached single-family dwelling
may be built on any one of the lots hereinafter listed in Subsection
C hereof and the sole vehicular access to said lots shall be from
Soundview Drive.
